TopicTitle: Yellow loading bar freezes after applying modular patches.

Articles.Content:
Everything loads fine until it gets to the last point in the loading sequence of KSP. It tends to freeze on a particular mod. In this case it is karbonite. 

I have modular manager 2.6.2 and karbonite is updated for 1.0 so I have no clue as to what the problem is.....

I appreciate the help. Thank you
